DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1, open-label, randomized, 4-period crossover study is designed to determine the relative bioavailability of GDC-0941 administered as a single dose of the market image formulation at 3 different hardnesses (hardness 1, 2, and 3) and as a single dose of the Phase 2 formulation to healthy male and female volunteers. Participants will be randomly assigned to 4 possible treatment sequences, each comprising 4 periods (1 per formulation), and GDC-0941 will be administered based on the assigned sequence. The study is expected to last 8 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Effect of Formulation and Tablet Hardness on the Bioavailability of Pictilisib in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Male and female participants between 18 and 55 years of age, inclusive, Body mass index (BMI) between 18.5 to 32 kg/m2, inclusive, Healthy, as determined by no clinically significant findings from medical history, ECG, and vital signs, and who are able to swallow and tolerate a tethered Heidelberg pH Capsule and have gastric pH measurements taken Any medical condition or history of such condition that may, in the opinion of the investigator, contraindicate participation in this study
